analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions

analyzed: sani dassana ttika saññojana duka ādi
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions in Triads

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: With the condition being a non-cognisable non-prehensible fetter, there arises a non-cognisable non-prehensible non-fetter state. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha  anidassana appaṭigham gantham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  anidassana appaṭigham ogham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: With respect to cause, six; with respect to object, three; … with respect to non-hindrance, six.🔽With the condition being a non-cognisable non-prehensible tie, there arises a non-cognisable non-prehensible non-tie state. (In brief.)

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham yogam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With the condition being a non-cognisable non-prehensible flood, there arises a non-cognisable non-prehensible non-flood state. (In brief.)🔽With the condition being a non-cognisable non-prehensible yoke, there arises a non-cognisable non-prehensible non-yoke state. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: With respect to cause, six; with respect to object, three; … with respect to non-hindrance, six.

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ parāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha  anidassana appaṭigham parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
